LanguageData.Bullet_DMS_AMR.label: heavy rifle bullet
LanguageData.DMS_Bullet_MiniMachineGun.label: Riot machinegun bullet
LanguageData.DMS_Bullet_RiotRevolver.label: 20 gauge beanbag
LanguageData.DMS_Bullet_RiotShotgun.label: 4 gauge bean bag
LanguageData.DMS_ElephantGun.label: Elephant Rifle
LanguageData.DMS_ElephantGun.description: Single-shot high caliber hunting rifle. While made to hunt big game or stop large hostile lifeforms with sheer kinetic energy, it is also used by early industrial colonies against mechanoids thanks to its simple manufacture requirements.
LanguageData.DMS_ElephantGun.tools.grip.label: grip
LanguageData.DMS_ElephantGun.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_ElephantGun.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Elephant Rifle
LanguageData.DMS_ElephantGun.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_ElephantGun.tools.barrel-1.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_KnuckledusterRevolver.label: Knuckleduster Revolver
LanguageData.DMS_KnuckledusterRevolver.description: A minature self-defense weapon commonly found on midworlds, it barely takes up any space when folded. Knuckledsters accept multiple calibers and may also used as brassknuckles in a pinch.
LanguageData.DMS_MiniMachineGun.label: Riot LMG
LanguageData.DMS_MiniMachineGun.description: Pistol caliber machinegun designed for colony defense. The Riot LMG can cut down unarmored enemy hordes and prisoner riots with ease.
LanguageData.DMS_MiniMachineGun.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_MiniMachineGun.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_Revolver.label: Riot Revolver
LanguageData.DMS_Revolver.description: S double-action revolver designed to load shotgun ammo. It was designed for personal defense purposes but soon became a favored sidearm for mech solders because it can be used against most enemy types at the same time.
LanguageData.DMS_Revolver.tools.grip.label: grip
LanguageData.DMS_Revolver.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_Revolver.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Riot Revolver
LanguageData.DMS_Revolver.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_Revolver.tools.barrel-1.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_RiotShotgun.label: Rifled slug gun
LanguageData.DMS_RiotShotgun.description: A high caliber rifled shotgun manufactured with stamped components designed for riot operations and disabling hostile mechs.
LanguageData.DMS_RiotShotgun.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_RiotShotgun.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_RiotShotgun.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Rifled slug gun
LanguageData.DMS_RiotShotgun.tools.stock-1.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_RiotShotgun.tools.barrel-1.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_SurvivalRifle.label: Survival rifle
LanguageData.DMS_SurvivalRifle.description: Foldable rifle issued to war machine crew members in case of emergency. Accepts multiple common calibers.
LanguageData.DMS_SurvivalRifle.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_SurvivalRifle.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_SurvivalRifle.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Survival rifle
LanguageData.DMS_SurvivalRifle.tools.stock-1.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_SurvivalRifle.tools.barrel-1.label: barrel
